review: Have absolutely loved my Fire TV! This is my first actual streaming box. I had been looking at different ones for a long time. When I saw the option for amazon fire tv and read about it, I immediately decided to go with it. It has not disappointed. In fact, it has exceeded expectations. I don't know what to expect with other players, so can't compare, but I know I am completely satisfied with this one.
